subject: Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
lead_paragraph: Tarkanian, the former basketball coach at the University of Nevada-Las Vegas, and Byers, the former head of the N.C.A.A., who both died in 2015, embodied a war of sports cultures.
